questions.question: At what age would a child normally be able to make a tower of 6 cubes, turn a doorknob, and use pronouns like "I" "me" or "you" ?
questions.explanation: the door knob and use pronouns like I, me, and you. Incorrect options: Option A, B and C are incorrect. Reference: O. P. Ghai, 9th edition, page no. 46
